A

actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl.CellGrid
This method is called by the Timer object set by startCellularAutomata() above, every stepLengthMillis milliseconds (optimistically).
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.CellGrid
This method is called by the Timer object set by startCellularAutomata() above, every stepLengthMillis milliseconds (optimistically).
algorithmDisplayStep() - Method in class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl.CellGridSection
This method completes the two-step algorithm by copying every cell from the buffer array updateCells into the display array displayCells.
algorithmUpdateStep() - Method in class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl.CellGridSection
This method completes the first step of the 2-step algorithm execution process, computing the updateCells cell grid array's value from the neighbors of each cell in the displayCells cell grid array.

C

CellGrid - Class in org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl
This class is a JComponent subclass that implements the viewable area in the GUI where the cellular automata runs.
CellGrid - Class in org.magentatobe.jgameoflife
This class implements the cells grid of Conway's Game of Life as a subclass of JComponent.
CellGrid(Dimension) - Constructor for class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl.CellGrid
This constructor initializes the CellGrid object.
CellGrid(Dimension) - Constructor for class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.CellGrid
This constructor initializes the CellGrid object.
CellGridDispatch - Class in org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl
This class implements a worker-threads-manager that instances and maintains communication with (currently) 16 worker threads each of which is running a CellGridSection object's run() method.
CellGridDispatch(CellGridSection[][]) - Constructor for class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl.CellGridDispatch
This method initializes the object and set instance variables.
CellGridSection - Class in org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl
This class implements a portion of the composite cell grid maintained by the CellGrid object.
CellGridSection(int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl.CellGridSection
This method initializes the CellGridSection object, setting instance variables.
clearCellGrid() - Method in class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl.CellGrid
This method is used to set all cells in the cell grid to 0, wiping out all alife forms and resetting the cellular automata to its starting state.
clearCellGrid() - Method in class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl.CellGridSection
This method clears the displayCells array by setting every value in it to 0.
clearCellGrid() - Method in class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.CellGrid
This method is used to set all cells in the cell grid to 0, wiping out all alife forms and resetting the cellular automata to its starting state.
clearSections() - Method in class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl.CellGridDispatch
This method is shorthand for calling delegateRunMode with the MODE_CLEAR flag to cause the composite cells grid to be cleared of all 'live' cells.

D

delegateRunMode(int) - Method in class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl.CellGridDispatch
This method accepts a CellGridSection constant execution mode flag and distributes it to worker threads to execute the matching method on all (currently) 16 CellGridSection objects.

E

EAST - Static variable in class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl.CellGridSection
This int constant is a signal value used to signify the compass direction east.

F

FINISHED - Static variable in class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl.CellGridSection
This int constant is a signal value used to signify that a distributed processing task is complete.

MODE_CLEAR - Static variable in class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl.CellGridSection
This int constant is a signal value used to signify a distributed processing task that calls clearCellGrid().
MODE_DISPLAY - Static variable in class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl.CellGridSection
This int constant is a signal value used to signify a distributed processing task that calls algorithmDisplayStep().
MODE_SEED - Static variable in class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl.CellGridSection
This int constant is a signal value used to signify a distributed processing task that calls seedCellGrid().
MODE_UPDATE - Static variable in class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl.CellGridSection
This int constant is a signal value used to signify a distributed processing task that calls algorithmUpdateStep().
modeFlagQueue - Variable in class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl.CellGridSection
This ArrayBlockingQueue<Integer> object holds the 1-capacity queue used to pass signal values back and forth between this object running in a worker thread and the CellGridDispatch object running in the main thread.

O

org.magentatobe.jgameoflife - package org.magentatobe.jgameoflife
This package implements Conway's Game of Life in a Swing GUI in a single-threaded implementation; unfortunately, it runs slowly, and the animation of the cellular automata chugs and lags.
org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl - package org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl
This package implements Conway's Game of Life in a Swing GUI using a threaded implementation that divides the cell grid into 16 subdivisions and uses a thread apiece in order to distribute and parallelize the work of the game of life algorithm.

P

paintComponent(Graphics) - Method in class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl.CellGrid
This method is called when paint() or repaint() is called.
paintComponent(Graphics) - Method in class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.CellGrid
This method is called when paint() or repaint() is called.

R

run() - Method in class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl.CellGridSection
This method implements the run() method called for by the Runnable interface, and is the method that's called by the Thread object that's instantiated around this CellGridSection object by CellGridDispatch.

S

sectionsRunAlgorithm() - Method in class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl.CellGrid
This method calls CellGridDispatch.sectionsRunAlgorithm() to execute a single step of the game of life algorithm.
sectionsRunAlgorithm() - Method in class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl.CellGridDispatch
This method is shorthand for calling delegateRunMode with the MODE_UPDATE and MODE_DISPLAY flags to effect a single step in the game of life algorithm.
seedCellGrid() - Method in class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl.CellGrid
This method populates the cellGrid by randomly setting 0 cells to 1.
seedCellGrid() - Method in class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl.CellGridSection
This method populates the displayCells array with randomly chosen 1 values in order to spontaneously create cellular automata before or during the automata execution.
seedCellGrid() - Method in class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.CellGrid
This method populates the cellGrid by randomly setting 0 cells to 1.
seedSections() - Method in class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl.CellGridDispatch
This method is shorthand for calling delegateRunMode with the MODE_SEED flag to cause the composite cells grid to be populated with randomly assigned 'live' cells.
setModeFlagQueue(ArrayBlockingQueue<Integer>) - Method in class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl.CellGridSection
This method is used by CellGridDispatch to set the modeFlagQueue instance variable.
setMonitors(Object, Object) - Method in class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl.CellGridSection
This method is used to set the two monitor objects that are used to signal and be signalled by the CellGridDispatch object running in the main thread.
setNeighbor(CellGridSection, int) - Method in class org.magentatobe.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl.CellGridSection
This method is used to set one of the 8 {compassDirection}Neighbor instance variables to another CellGridSection object.
